Why these colours?

PICKI's colour palette features a mix of playful and vibrant hues, with a soft pink that brings warmth and friendliness, complemented by a fresh green that adds a natural and calming touch. A deep purple provides contrast and depth, while a cheerful yellow adds energy and brightness. Together, these colours create a lively, modern aesthetic with an approachable and dynamic vibe.

Palette
